page.title: 06 Weaverthorpe, Year 1985
page.content: The year usually opens with weather as the main topic-{snow}often closes the roads out of the valley, nowadays only briefly but occasionaly the school bus for Norton may be cancelled for 3 or 4 days. March: the Church{Jumble Sale.} May: a Brownie Jumble Sale, a Chapel Children's{Anniversary}and the Young Farmer's{Gymkhana.} June: the Church{Clay Pidgeon} {Shoot}and the Chapel{Barn Dance.} July: The Church{Coffee Evening} and{Garden Party,}Chapel Anniversary, School:-{Sponsored Walk, Sports, {Swimming Gala at Norton and Open Day. August: the{Village Show}and{Sale {for the Blind.} Sept.: Church Sponsored Walk, School {Sale of Work,}Chapel{Harvest Festival. October: Church and School Festivals. December:{School Party and Concert.
